name: Patriot on Base
description: The $PATRIOT Token Crypto community commissioned a bronze statue of Donald J Trump’s infamous fist in the air following his assassination attempt. Once complete, DJT’s statue will stand over 22FT tall and be placed for public viewing. The PATRIOT Statue will be unveiled at the inauguration in January. $PATRIOT is the first crypto token President Trump has posted on his Truth Social media platform.
